gems.name: rtfm-filemanager
gems.info: A full featured terminal browser with syntax highlighted files, images shown in the terminal, videos thumbnailed, etc. You can bookmark and jump around easily, delete, rename, copy, symlink and move files. RTFM has a a wide range of other features. New in 2.0.0: Goddamn! We now have an OpenAI interface for RTFM. Read the doc/helpfile and use key 'I' and enjoy!
